text:
miqyaMgIH | svaSvA$stvA suqrathA# marjayE-mAqsmE kShaqtrANi# dhArayEqranuq dyUn || 
iqha tvAq BUryA ca#rEq dupaqtman-dOShA#vasta rdIdiqvA(gm)saqmanuq dyUn |
krIDa#ntastvA suqmana#saH sapEmAqBi dyuqmnA ta#sthiqvA(gm) sOq janA#nAM || 
yastvAq-svaSva#H suhiraqNyO a#gna upaqyAtiq vasu#matAq rathE#na | 
tasya# trAqtA-Ba#vasiq tasyaq saKAq yasta# Atiqthya mA#nuqShag jujO#Shat ||
maqhO ru#jAmi - [  ] 31
